Controllers

Class AddDeleteProblemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.AddDeleteProblemController

  • public class AddDeleteProblemController
extends java.lang.Object
    AddDeleteProblem Controller Can create a new problem with inputs attribute Can add given new problem online and offline Can remove given problem online and offline
    See Also:
    Problem

        Create a problem object with createdByUserId, title, date and description

        Returns:
        problem object
        Throws:
        UserIDMustBeAtLeastEightCharactersException - thrown when < 8 characters
